name: Global - Table Row Highlighter
description: Outlines table rows that are active or hovered over for better readability, as a global style this will be active on all browser content.

user.name: Furgelnod
user.about: Internet lover and holder of cups. Signed up here to share anything useful that he may devise with stylish.

additional_info:
The default outline colour is magenta for highest contrast compatibility, considering the wide range of background colours on the web.
The !important tag is missing for a reason, if the content's designer has actually bothered to add these features to their stylesheets we don't want to override those.
